name: .G1T File Extension
summary: Learn about .G1T files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can use Gust Tools (Windows) to extract the textures a G1T file contains and repack textures into a G1T file. You can also open G1T files with Noesis (Windows), with the Noesis G1M/G1T/G1A Importer plug-in installed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
